title: When alive mouse acts erratically. Usually when certain enemy champ is near.
body:
Hello, 

This problem has been around for a while. One possible cause is DDoS of another palyer wanting to win more than play honestly. 

Mouse moves with jumps and is stuck - and client reacts also erratically to keyboard. I have feeling this is new exploit in wide spread use. IT does include once or twice my champ doing something I did not command, thus source is possible faked packets to server. I cannot investigate that.

replies.body:
That's quite a theory! While many things are possible, this issue is often caused by certain background applications trying to take window focus from League. I'd strongly recommend [completing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure those apps are causing issues for you.

Let me know if this worked for you.

No change of services. ANd problme is tied to playing LOL thus the logical conclusion is either LOL client is causing it - or as it is persistnet near some champ of enemy team - some players have found new way to exploit.

It started month or two ago, at most 3 months ago. And rebooting adsl box helps, and the problem can return after reboot by playing single game of lol. Most of the time I get it after i am winning enemy, sudden "dejavu" and lag starts near certain enemy champ.
Interesting. Did you complete all the steps inside the connection guide?
I was experiencing a problem like this a few months ago. What kind of computer are you playing League on? Is it a laptop?
